event: EU pledges to react to rumors of U.S. tariffs on aluminum and steel
Trump says he will announce 25 percent tariffs on the European Union (EU)
EU imposes retaliatory tariffs in response to U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs
Trump threatens 200 percent tariffs on alcohol from the European Union
EU delays retaliatory tariffs to mid-April
EU to join Canadian WTO case against U.S. tariffs on aluminum and steel
Liberation Day: 20% tariff on EU goods announced
EU votes in favor of 10 to 25 percent retaliatory tariffs on U.S. products, including tobacco, motorcycles, poultry, steel, and aluminum
Trump announces a ninety-day pause on reciprocal tariffs, excluding China
EU announces a ninety-day pause on retaliatory tariffs against the U.S.
Trump announces 50 percent tariffs on EU imports starting June 1
Trump pauses 50 percent EU tariffs to July 9
EU signals progress toward provisional deal with the United States
Trump sends letters announcing 30 percent tariffs on EU starting August 1 unless a new deal is signed
EU delays retaliatory tariffs on U.S. goods, citing ongoing negotiations before August 1
EU finalizes a second list of countermeasures to target U.S. goods
EU readies a single retaliation package worth 93 billion euros, combining the first (April) and second (July) packages
US and EU announce a new trade deal with a 15% tariff ceiling
The US and EU publish details of trade agreement
EU introduces legislation to remove tariffs on U.S. industrial goods
White House issues Executive Order 14346 to modify tariffs in compliance with trade deal
U.S. lowers tariffs on EU vehicles to 15 percent
Implementation dialogue between EU Trade and Economic Security Commissioner Maroš Šefčovič, US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick, and United States Trade Representative Jamieson Greer
EU council adopts negotiating mandate for implementing the tariff elements of the Joint Statement
